algorithm_technique: Iterate with two pointers, appending characters alternately.
problem_summary_simple: Combine two strings by taking characters one by one from each.
problem_summary_technical: Merge strings by alternating characters using pointers, handling length differences.
key_insights: The core idea is to iterate through both strings simultaneously.
A list is used to build the result efficiently before joining.
Handling unequal string lengths is crucial by checking bounds.
